## Labels

-----------------------------

### `labs()`：
```{r}
t + labs(
  x = "New x axis label", 
  y = "New y axis label",
  title = "Add a title above the plot",
  subtitle = "Add a subtitle below title",
  caption = "Add a caption below plot"
)
```

### `annotate()`：
```{r}
t + annotate(geom = "text", x = 12, y = 9,
             label = "This is annotate")
```
